College_Name: Indian School of Business and Finance (ISBF)
College_Summary: Indian School of Business and Finance (ISBF), New Delhi is one of the reputed institutions in Delhi. Founded in 2006, ISBF functions as an affiliate institution of the University of London and is one of the five Featured Teaching Centres of the London School of Economics (LSE). LSE is among the foremost educational institutions in the world, ranked among the top 10 for Economics, Management and Finance (QS, 2020), ISBF is one of its top 5 Teaching Institutions globally. It offers undergraduate honours programmes in Economics, Finance & Management. All ISBF students study the same curriculum, and are evaluated to the same standards, as LSE students in London, and in doing so they become part of a 54,000 strong international student community.

It is affiliated with Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University and has been approved by AICTE. GGSIPU conducts the Common Entrance Test (CET), which serves as the basis for admission to all courses. The intake for PG courses is 60 seats, whereas the intake for B.Tech degrees varies by branch, ranging from 60 to 180. The institute offers B.Tech and B.Tech Lateral Entry programs at the UG level and MBA at the PG level through nine departments.

Manav Rachna University (MRU), Faridabad is ranked 174th (Engineering) and ranked 151-200 (University) by NIRF India Rankings 2020 by MHRD. MRU Faridabad provides 100% placement assistance to students. More than 100 companies participated in the placement drive at the university and offered various roles to the students with great salary packages. The highest annual salary package offered amounts to INR 23 LPA. MRU Faridabad offers various UG & PG Courses in the discipline of Engineering & Technology, Law, Education, Business Studies and Applied Sciences.

College_Summary: Sushant University – Erstwhile Ansal University, Gurgaon is ranked 4th for Best Emerging Business School by Times of India B-School Survey and ranked 1st for Private Architecture School by Outlook. More than 250 recruiters have visited for on-campus recruitment. The institute has a strong 3500+ alumni network and over 500 students have gone studying abroad under SU’s partnership program with universities in the United States, UK and Australia.

SRM Ghaziabad is a renowned educational institution that aspires to be one of the best private universities in Delhi-NCR. SRM Ghaziabad was established in the year 1997. The university is recognized as Category 1 & A Grade by UGC & MHRD and is approved by AICTE & PCI. SRM Ghaziabad offers various UG, PG & Doctoral Programs. It also offers professional degree courses in Engineering and Technology, Management, Computer Applications, Pharmacy, and Hotel Management.

The University Institute of Engineering & Technology (UIET) Maharshi Dayanand University is one of the largest institutes in Haryana. Established in 2005, the college offers quality education with exceptional infrastructural facilities. The college is recognised by AICTE. The university aims to impart education and expertise in the field of Science and technology.

College_Name: St. Andrews Institute of Technology and Management - [SAITM], Gurgaon
College_Summary: St. Andrews Institute of Technology and Management (SAITM), Gurgaon is awarded ‘Best Engineering College for promoting Industry-Academic Interface’ by the Hon’ble Government of Goa Smt. Mridula Sinha. SAITM Gurgaon offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering, Management and Computer Application. Admission is done on the basis of merit and entrance examinations. The institute provides 100% placement assistance to its students. The highest package is recorded at INR 10 LPA and the average package is recorded at INR 4 LPA. Some of the potential employers include Amazon, Genpact, Tech Mahindra, Reliance, TATA, Dyson, BT, etc.

College_Name: Meera Bai Institute of Technology, New Delhi
College_Summary: Meera Bai Institute of Technology, affiliated to GGSIPU, is a technical college offering Diploma and Degree courses to students. The college provides 10 diversified Diploma Courses, BBA and B.Voc. The admission to these courses is merit and entrance-based. The students need to fulfill the eligibility criteria defined separately for all the courses. To apply for admission, students must visit the official website and fill the application form.

Greater Noida Institute of Technology or GNIT, Greater Noida is one of the reputed private engineering colleges in India. The college is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. GNIT, Greater Noida is part of the GNIOT Group of Institutions and offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in engineering, management, commerce, and paramedical sciences.

Greater Noida Institute of Technology, Greater Noida is one of the most reputed private Engineering and Management institutes in North India. It has been ranked 143rd for MBA by The Week 2020. The Institute is awarded the Best Management Institute award in North India for Industry Interface by Rashtriya Shiksha Gaurav Puraskar Ceremony – 2019. GNIOT (Engineering Institute) has achieved NAAC A+ grade in its first cycle.

College_Summary: Echelon institute of Technology, Faridabad, established in 2007, is one of the oldest technical institutions in NCR. The institute is affiliated to JC Bose University of Science & Technology, Faridabad, and is approved by AICTE, Ministry of HRD, Government of India & Department of Technical Education, Haryana.

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, COA, PCI, BCI, ICAR, UGC

College_Summary: GD Goenka University (GDGU) is a private university established in the year 2013 in Gurgaon, Haryana. It is recognized by UGC, BCI, PCI, COA, NCTE, and ICAR. The university is approved by the Government of Haryana and achieved a QS IGUAGE “Diamond” rating. It holds the membership of AIU, ACU and IAU. The university is spread over an area of 60 acres. GD Goenka University offers more than 100 courses in the disciplines of Engineering, Management, Science, Design and many more. It has collaborated with 30+ universities and professional institutions in the USA, Canada, Australia, the UK and others. It has ten institutes offering higher education in various fields. GD Goenka University is awarded as the “Best Upcoming Private University” in India by ASSOCHAM.

College_Summary: Santosh Deemed to be University, Ghaziabad is a true academic powerhouse shaping the future of Medical and Dental Sciences. Santosh Institute of Allied Hwaelth science is run by “Maharaja Educational Trust” under the leadership of Dr. P. Mahalingam. It received Deemed Universities Status in 2007 by the Ministry of HRD and University Grants Commission. For the past 25 years, the institute has been delivering quality medical/dental education & healthcare services and offers Degree, Diploma and Doctorate Courses in the discipline of Medical and Dental Sciences. The institute is affiliated with Atal Bihari Vajpayee Medical University, Lucknow.

College_Summary: Ganga Group of Institutions was founded in 1989 under the recognition of UGC, AICTE, COA and NCTE. GGI offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and diploma programs in over 5 disciplines. All the Courses offered by the university are affiliated to MDU, Rohtak.

Birla Institute of Technology (BIT) Noida is one of the ten extension centers of BIT was established in the year 1998 in order to make the education and research capabilities of the Institute accessible to a large number of youngsters pursuing careers in the related field. The Institute offers various Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Doctoral level courses such as B.Sc., BBA, MBA, Ph.D., etc. Admission to certain courses will be done on the basis of the Management and Engineering Entrance Exams conducted at the national level. BIT also conducted its own entrance exam for B.Sc. and MCA courses.

College_Name: International Institute of Technology and Management  - [IITM], Sonepat
College_Summary: International Institute of Technology & Management (IITM) was established in the year 2010. The institute is approved by AICTE, New Delhi & HSBTE, Panchkula and affiliated to DCRUST University, Murthal. It is accredited A grade by NAAC. The sprawling campus is located 10 kms from Sonepat city. The college offers courses in the field of science, technology, engineering, management and pharmacy. The campus is spread its wings in 13 acres of land on the Delhi-Amritsar National Highway and it is just 40 kms from Delhi.

Established in 2006, Vidya Knowledge Park is located in Meerut, Uttar Pradesh. It is affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. and Chaudhary Charan Singh University, Meerut. The college offers a range of programs, both undergraduate as well as postgraduate courses. Vidya Knowledge Park, Meerut has 8 different schools of its own such as Vidya College of Engineering, Vidya School of Business, Vidya School of Fashion Technology, etc. Several courses are offered through these institutions. The major courses offered by the Vidya Knowledge Park, Meerut include B.Tech, M.Tech, MCA, MBA, and BBA with various specializations. All courses and the college itself are approved by AICTE.

Jaypee University, located in Anoopshahr, Uttar Pradesh was founded in the year 2014. The university offers UG courses like B.Tech., B.Com., BA, BBA, B.Sc. in various specialisations. Jaypee University Anoopshahr also offers doctoral level Ph.D. courses in 4 streams.

Rishihood University is the first and only impact university in India. It offers B. Des., B.Sc (Hons) Psychology, Makers Undergrad BBA, and B.Tech at the UG level. Admission to all the UG programs is done based on aptitude tests and personal interviews. The institute is approved by UGC and focuses on creativity, entrepreneurship, and leadership in the students.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech] (Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence)

College_Summary: Vedatya Institute, Gurugram Gurgaon is amongst the premium hospitality and culinary Institutes of India as per Education Times, Times of India. Vedatya, established in 2000, offers internationally recognized undergraduate and postgraduate programs in Hospitality, Culinary Arts, Design, and Business Management. The Institue has consistently reported a 100% placement record for its students and is proud to have 26% of hotel management graduates placed in management trainee positions against an industry average of 2%. Management trainee position is the fastest way to becoming a general manager at a hotel. Students in the culinary program secure international paid internships & work with Michelin star restaurants & chefs around the world. The design students get direct mentorship from award-winning industry professionals and the finest opportunities to work with the fashion houses and service design industry of India. Admission to all UG & PG courses at Vedatya Institute is done on the basis of merit followed by an interview round. The application process can be done online.

College_Summary: G.L. Bajaj Institute of Technology & Management Noida is a prestigious Institute established in the year 2007. It is affiliated to Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University and has been approved by AICTE. The Institute currently offers various courses including B.Tech at the UG level and M. Tech, MBA, and MCA at the PG level.

College_Summary: G.B. Pant Govt. Engineering College, Delhi was established in April/May 2007 by the Government of NCT Delhi to run B. Tech programs, with courses commencing on August 1, 2007. The institute is affiliated to Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University and has been approved by the AICTE. It initially enrolled 180 students, 60 of whom were enrolled in each of the three B.Tech programs: Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE), and Mechanical and Automation Engineering (MAE).

College_Summary: DSEU Okhla II Campus, formerly known as DITE, was established in 2007 by the Government of Delhi. The institute is located in the Okhla Industrial Area, one of the most highlighted industrial areas of Delhi. DSEU Okhla II Campus offers multiple programs at the UG and PG levels which include BTech, MTech, and diploma programs. The institute offers a 4-year long BTech program under 3 different specialisations. Admission to this program is based on the JEE Mains and IPU CET scores. Also, the DSEU Okhla II Campus offers an MTech program at the PG level in the Tool Engineering discipline. The institute accepts GATE scores for admission to its MTech program. The college also provides a diploma course in Mechanical Engineering and the admission procedure is strictly based on the marks and merits obtained in the qualifying exams.

College_Name: Ambedkar Institute of Technology - [AIT], New Delhi
College_Summary: Ambedkar Institute of Technology popularly knowns as AIT. It was established by the Department of training and technical education (D.T.T.E.), Government of N.C.T and is also recognized by university grants commission(UGC).  It offers a diploma in four different specializations whereas  BCA and B.Voc are the new initiatives of the institute. The institute's total enrollment capacity is 1304. Admission to these courses is entrance based. Applicants seeking admission to the institute may apply online. The institute is well equipped with all the facilities with the motive of providing premier experience and learning to their students.

College_Name: Dronacharya College of Engineering - Placement, Fees, Courses, Admission 2024, Faculty
College_Summary: Dronacharya College of Engineering (DCE), Gurgaon was established in 1998 by Smt Anguri Devi Charitable Trust. Dronacharya College of Engineering is approved by the All-India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated with Gurugram University (GU). The institute is recognized under 12(f) and 2(b) by University Grant Commission (UGC) Act 1956 and ISO Certified for 21001-2018 and 10001-2004. It has also received accreditation from NBA and NAAC. The college received a Certificate of Appreciation Categorized as a Band Excellent under the category "Colleges/Institutes (Private / Self-Financed) (Technical)" in  Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA) 2021 by MHRD. DCE also received “Outstanding Institution Award” from NITTTR Chandigarh for 2012-13 & 2022-23 session.

Institute of Engineering and Technology, Alwar was established in the year 1998. IET is promoted by All India Society for Advance Education and Research. College is Rajasthan Technical University, Kota and is approved by AICTE.

KCC Institute of Technology and Management is located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh. It is one of the sister institutes for engineering and management studies under KCC institutions. It has approvals from the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and UGC and affiliation from Dr APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU).

Mewat Engineering College is the pioneer college in the field of Engineering in India. With the vision to provide excellence in technical education, meet the growing demands of industries in the future and benefit the society as a whole. It is a full fledged college imparting full time programme B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Electronics and Communications Engineering, Mechanical Engineering and Civil Engineering.The College aims at providing modern education alongside Islamic education to the minority community. In addition to running various schools, vocational institutions, providing grants to number of schools and colleges; the Board has established Mewat Engineering College (Waqf).

College_Name: Mangalmay Institute of Engineering and Technology
College_Summary: Mangalmay Institute of Engineering and Technology (MIET), Greater Noida is ranked 15th for Engineering by Amar Ujala & IMRB International Education Survey and ranked AAA by Business & Management Chronicle. MIET Noida assures placement opportunities to students. More than 200 companies have visited for on-campus placement. MIET offers a degree course in the discipline of Engineering.

IAMR Group of Institutions (IAMR), Ghaziabad is ranked 52nd by SiliconIndia Education B-Survey and ranked A+ by Business and Management Chronicle. The institution offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering, Management, Physiotherapy, Law and many more. IAMR has 5 institutes and 1 school in Ghaziabad and Meerut.

College_Name: World College of Technology and Management, Gurgaon
College_Summary: World College of Technology and Management, established in 2007, is a private college affiliated to Maharshi Dayanand University (NAAC A+ Grade University) and approved by AICTE (DTE Department of Technical Education Haryana, Ministry of HRD) and HSBTE (Haryana State Board of Tech Education). The college offers various UG, PG and Diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering, Technology, Management and Computer Application. The flagship courses of the college are B.Tech across 8 specializations, M.Tech in 5 specializations and MBA across 5 specializations. Apart from that, WCTM also offers BBA, BCA, MCA and Polytechnic Diploma courses. Admission to the B.Tech program is done on the basis of the JEE Main scores. Candidates seeking admission in the M.Tech course, candidates ne4ed to obtain a valid score in GATE. The college accepts CAT, MAT, CMAT, XAT entrance exam scores for MBA admission. However, the selection of candidates for the other courses is merit-based.

College_Summary: Geeta Engineering College (GEC), Panipat was established by the Geeta Group of Institutions, run by K.R. Education Society. It aims at imparting knowledge in a way that could improve the personality and ethics of students. It is located on National Highway NH-71, and is about 10 Kms from the industrial city of Panipat, Haryana.

College_Name: Vishveshwarya Group of Institutions - [VGI], Greater Noida

College_Summary: NIIT University (NU) is a not for profit UGC (University Grants Commission) approved institution. A premier institution, marked by higher learning and research, NU seeks to create original thinkers who will lead the knowledge society of the future. The University offers 4-year programs in B.Tech. (Computer Science & Engineering, Electronics & Communication, Biotechnology, Data Science, and Cyber Security), 4-year Integrated MBA (Marketing & Marketing Analytics, Entrepreneurship, Finance Banking & FinTech, Business Analytics, Communication & Media studies, Digital & Social Media Marketing), 4-year Integrated M.Sc (Computer Science) and 3-year BBA (Finance, Banking & Insurance, Digital Marketing, Business Analytics, Family Managed Business).

College_Summary: Maharishi University of Information Technology (MUIT) is a private university established in 2001 and approved by UGC. It offers undergraduate, diploma and doctoral courses in the discipline of Data Science, Law, Animation and Journalism and Mass Communication. Admission to the courses depends on the performance of the candidates in the entrance examination conducted by the University.

Meerut Institute of Technology is situated in Meerut in the Uttar Pradesh state of India. Established in 2007, it is approved by AICTE and affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University. Meerut Institute of Technology provides 8 different courses at the UG level. The institute values the significance of the overall development of personality and to achieve certain skills such as Communication Skills, Negotiation Skills, Critical Reasoning Ability, Right Attitude, Self Image, Motivation, Goals, Resume Writing, Mock Interviews, etc.

Rawal institutions is a private institution established in 2008 under the aegis of Goyal Educational and Welfare Society. Rawal institutions include Rawal Institute of Engineering And Technology, Rawal Institute of Management, Rawal College of Education. These Institutions provide quality engineering and management education to students and transform them into employable managers, technocrats, bureaucrats and above all good citizens of India.

College_Summary: Bharat Institute of Technology is located in Meerut, Uttar Pradesh and was established in 2001. The institute is accredited by NBA and is affiliated to AKTU, Lucknow. It is one of the top private engineering colleges in the area and comes under the BIT institutions. BIT offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate programmes in fields including Engineering, Pharmaceutical and Management along various specializations. Admissions are based on entrance exam scores. Along with this, BIT is ranked 24th by CSR for the best private engineering college. BIT offers the best infrastructure and academic facilities to help students improve their theoretical as well as practical knowledge.

ITS Engineering College, Greater Noida is ranked under Top 10 Best Private Engineering Colleges in North India by India Today and awarded Best Engineering College for Industry Interface and Placements in North India by ASSOCHAM. ITS has been ranked by ARIIA (Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements) as the top 6-25 innovative higher education private or self-financed college/ institutions across India and also among the top 3 in Uttar Pradesh. ITS Engineering College, affiliated to Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University is one of the most advanced engineering colleges in India. With accreditations by NAAC & NBA and approved by AICTE, this institute has a bag full of achievements to boost on.

College_Summary: Global Institute of Technology & Management (GITM), Gurgaon was established in 2008, affiliated to MDU, Rohtak and approved by AICTE, Ministry of HRD, Govt. of India and also by Directorate of Technical Education, Govt. of Haryana. The institute offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Technology, Pharmacy, Management and Computer Applications. Check: GITM Gurgaon Cutoff

College_Name: PIET Panipat, Courses, Fees, Ranking, Admission 2024
College_Summary: Panipat Institute of Engineering and Technology (PIET), offers UG, PG and Diploma courses in Engineering, Management, Pharmacy disciplines.  PIET fees for B.Tech is INR 5.12 Lacs whereas for the MBA Program is INR 2.50 Lacs. Admissions to B.Tech are based on valid scores of JEE Main, while for MBA admission is based on CAT/MAT/CMAT followed by a Personal Interview Round. For Diploma in Mechanical Engineering (LEET), ITI of at least two years’ duration or 10+2 with PCM or 10+2 vocational is required.

Sanskar Educational Group (SEG), Ghaziabad was established in 2005 and is affiliated and approved by AICTE, PCI, CoA and affiliated to AKTU. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, research level and diploma programs in the disciplines of Engineering Technology, Pharmacy, Architecture, and Management. Admission to SEG Admission is done on the basis of various entrance exams.

College_Name: New Delhi Institute For Information Technology & Management - [NDIITM], New Delhi
College_Summary: New Delhi Institute of Information Technology and Management (NDIITM) is a prestigious management institute established in the year 1999. It is affiliated to Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University and has been approved by the AICTE. The institute offers BBA, BCA, at the UG level and MBA, PGDM at the PG level. Its campus is situated at the heart of Delhi with excellent infrastructural facilities. The institute provides excellent employment opportunities to its students in reputed companies. The institute has a record of providing 100% placement in the PGDM & MBA program.
